LanguageData.AS_Hediff_OdEnergy.label: Od Energy
LanguageData.AS_Hediff_OdEnergy.description: The ability to store and retain od energy in the body. Not only does the stored od energy improve one's physical abilities, but it can also be further enhanced by using the stored od energy. The storage capacity and the degree to which physical abilities are enhanced depend on how proficient one is in the manipulation of od energy. Even inexperienced individuals will grow over the years.
